data.text:
@MicciGH @SpankySpankster @ParynoidAndroid @BadVaccineTakes WebMD is not disinformation, nor are clinical trial studies:

https://t.co/rroDGTME6H
@ParynoidAndroid @BadVaccineTakes Go ahead but it won’t help you much in the early viral stage.
@Tombriscoe0 @OvelhaBrava @BadVaccineTakes No but given that hydrogen peroxide is a potent oxidizer, they were definitely have  cleaner lungs. Eventually.

@GrantAlpaugh @notBsilenced @BadVaccineTakes Very much not. Pretty much the only thing they have in common is that they both come in a liquid state. It’s not a good idea to ingest hydrogen peroxide either but trying to ingest bleach will kill you much faster.

@BadVaccineTakes @Top_Muppetries He actually doesn’t mention bleach there. Povidone iodine and hydrogen peroxide are definitely not bleach. It’s definitely not a good idea and will not stop Covid but I’ve seen them recommending much worse. Like …inhaling hydrogen peroxide. These people are crazy.

@notBsilenced @BadVaccineTakes i didn’t say it was good to drink. i said it wasn’t bleach. literally nobody calls it bleach. it is wrong to say it is bleach. that’s my point. hydrogen peroxide is not bleach.
@OvelhaBrava @BadVaccineTakes Pretty sure the viral load doesn’t just remain in your nose and go nowhere else, right?
@BadVaccineTakes I’ll do you one even better! https://t.co/rJuTBnOPoD
